settings.banner_desc: See answers to our most frequently asked questions. If there is something you still have a question about, use our contact us form.

settings.head:
Frequently Asked
Questions
settings.desc: See answers to our most frequently asked questions. If there is something you still have a question about, use our contact us form.

settings.question: Where is ZeLaZe made?
settings.answer: We manufacture our products in the USA.

settings.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.answer: You can expect your order to be delivered between 3-5 business days, delivered using USPS.

settings.question: How are your products different from other skincare brands?
settings.answer:
1) We formulate using South East Asian root extracts and botanicals that have been used throughout history to brighten and sooth skin.

2) We are selective when in choosing our active ingredients. There are 5 types of Vitamin C and we specifically choose Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate to formulate with because it is:

a) Most effective in brightening the skin.

b) Least irritating on skin

c) Most stable form of Vitamin C

3) This dualistic approach to formulation is tested for real results!

settings.question: Do your products contain any animal products or derivatives?
settings.answer: Our products are vegan-friendly and cruelty-free. We do not test on animals or use any animal components or by-products.

settings.question: How do I place an order?
settings.answer: All the Lorem Ipsum generators on the Internet tend to repeat predefined chunks as necessary, making this the first true generator on the Internet. It uses a dictionary of over 200 Latin words, combined with a handful of model sentence structures, to generate Lorem Ipsum which looks reasonable. The generated Lorem Ipsum is therefore always free from repetition, injected humour, or non-characteristic words etc.
